story_27_57000/2401_1001_0200_10:
...servant?! If you were my servant, we could
hang out together all day!
story_27_57000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Wh-what’s the matter? You’d hate being a
servant that much?! Well, I guess...
story_27_57000/2401_1001_0400_10: in that case, would you be my...
story_27_57000/2401_1001_0600_10: Oh! It seems like you really like that idea.
story_27_57000/2401_1001_0700_10:
OK! From now on, the two of us are going to
be pals!
story_27_57000/2401_1001_0800_10: Friends forever, OK? Don’t forget it!
